# selectedPolarPattern

**Instance Property**

The data source’s active polar pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedPolarPattern: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern? { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0], the data source doesn’t support directivity configuration.

## Configuring Microphone Directivity

- **supportedPolarPatterns**: The set of directivity configurations supported by the data source.
- **preferredPolarPattern**: The preferred directivity configuration for the data source.
- **setPreferredPolarPattern(_:)**: Selects the preferred directivity configuration for the data source.
- **AVAudioSession.PolarPattern**: Constants that describe the possible polar patterns of the data source on an iOS device.
